subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Women)
Native Americans
lead_paragraph: Shoni and Jude Schimmel, who belong to the Confederated Tribes of the Umatilla in eastern Oregon, have become indispensable members of the Louisville Cardinals.
snippet: Shoni and Jude Schimmel, who belong to the Confederated Tribes of the Umatilla in eastern Oregon, have become indispensable members of the Louisville Cardinals.
